description: Statistics show that using images in social media posts draws traffic. However, paying for professionally looking images might get too expensive. If you are a non-designer and want to create your own images for social media, it might take forever to learn graphic design and how to use the tools. In this course, you will learn how to create stunning social media images in an intuitive program that can be mastered in any time. Moreover, you donâ€™t have to buy or download anything - the program is cloud based and free to use. Sounds too good to be true? Click Enroll now and quickly learn how to create awesome social media images in no time!
title: The Non-Designer's Guide to Creating Social Media Images
